document.full_text: an earthquake with a magnitude of 6.5 shook southern mexico on thursday, including parts of mexico city, but there were no immediate reports of damage or injuries.
document.title: quake shakes mexico, no reports of damage or injuries
lines_and_colors: an earthquake with a magnitude of 6.5 shook southern mexico on thursday, including parts of mexico city, but there were no immediate reports of damage or injuries.
